entry.title: Derby Originals Heavy Duty Adjustable 30” Nylon Hanging Bucket Straps for Water and Feed Buckets - Available in Four Fun Patterns
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stall and Arena
Price: 4.95

Derby Originals line of adjustable bucket straps are made from a high-quality nylon web material that is 1” wide and adjustable from 10” to 30” to allow you to use them for a wide variety of applications. These bucket straps also have stainless steel hardware that is designed for indoor or outdoor use. We offer bucket straps in a wide variety of options, including: Blue Chevron, Grey Floral, Paisley, Aztec, Black, Charcoal, Coral, Pink, Red, Brown, Olive Green, Hurricane Blue, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Light Purple, and Purple.

  • DURABLE DESIGN - our bucket straps are made from a high-quality nylon web material that is 1” wide. Our bucket straps also have stainless steel hardware that is designed for indoor or outdoor use.
  • IDEAL FOR MANY APPLICATIONS - these sturdy bucket straps were designed to be used indoors or outdoors and are ideal for use on gates, fence posts, inside stalls and barns, out in the pasture, or even in your horse trailer.
  • ADJUSTABLE FROM 10 TO 30” - these 1” wide nylon bucket straps can be adjusted anywhere from approx. 10” to 30” to allow you to use them for a wide variety of applications.
  • HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - these bucket straps utilize stainless steel hardware to ensure they are long lasting in outdoor conditions and do not rust.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS - our bucket straps are available in a wide variety of colors, including: Black, Charcoal, Coral, Pink, Red, Brown, Olive Green, Hurricane Blue, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Light Purple, and Purple.

entry.title: Derby Originals 3 Bar Fold Away Swivel Blanket and Saddle Pad Rack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stall and Arena
Price: 19.95

These swiveling tack racks were designed to help maximize space in your barn, trailer, or tack room, and offer a cost-effective, space-saving solution to storing your bulky blankets and pads. Simply mount this rack to any wall using the included hardware and you're set!


Unlike normal tack storage stands, these racks are designed for effective storage and can hold English and Western saddle pads, horse sheets and blankets, and more! These racks can comfortably accommodate 1-3 saddle pads per bar, and 1-5 horse blankets per bar on average. These tack racks can even be used to hang bridles, reins, and other tack pieces for easy access and storage. Or, use these bars to display your favorite harness set!


When you're done adding items to these tack racks, simply fold the bars flat up against the wall and your items will be kept in an out of the way, but easy to reach place.


This item will ship unassembled. Some assembly is required.


  • THE PERFECT SPACE SAVER - this tack rack was designed to fold flat against the wall and swivel open for easy access to your favorite tack pieces. When flush against the wall, this tack rack only protrudes by 1-2", making it an effective way to maximize space without bulk.
  • STURDY STEEL CONSTRUCTION - this swiveling tack rack is made of sturdy steel that is designed to hold up strong for many years to come. These bars will not bend or distort under the weight of your tack.
  • IDEAL FOR ALL KINDS OF TACK - our 24" long tack rack was designed to comfortably accommodate hanging horse blankets, English and Western saddle pads and blankets, and tack such as bridles, headstalls, reins, and more
  • SWIVELING BARS ALLOW FOR EASY TACK RETRIEVAL - the bars on this tack rack can swivel a full 180 degrees to allow you to easily maneuver them to add or remove tack.
  • GREAT FOR USE IN TRAILERS AND TACK ROOMS - these compact, sturdy tack racks are ideal for use in small spaces, such as in the trailer, in your tack room, or other areas of the barn.

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium Horse Blanket Storage Bag with Mesh Pockets - Includes Four Desiccant Pouches to Keep Blankets Fresh
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Carry Bags and Covers
Price: 24.95

Derby Originals Premium Horse Blanket Storage Bag with Mesh Pockets is a unique blanket bag that is unlike any other and features a design with four inner pockets that contain desiccants. This design was created to combat the common problems of moisture build-up causing blankets to mold and leather to spoil. This design also accommodates mothballs and repellants, in order to give you another level of protection against common damaging barnyard bugs and rodents. Unlike other basic designs, this offers advanced protection against pests chewing holes in blankets, ruining leather, urinating inside the bag, etc. If you’re looking for an attractive, functional, protective, and innovative blanket storage bag, this is the one for you!

THE IDEAL BARN STORAGE SOLUTION - this premium blanket storage bag was designed to easily hang from a stall gate, wall, or fence and has plenty of room to store your horse’s blankets, tack, grooming supplies, and more!

FOUR INSIDE POCKETS CONTAIN DESICCANT PACKETS - this blanket storage bag contains four small inner pockets that come with desiccant pouches to help prevent mold and moisture buildup around your blankets and tack.

UNIQUE DESIGN KEEPS BUGS & RODENTS AWAY - this bag’s four desiccant pockets can also be used to add mothballs or bug and rodent repellents to this bag to help keep damaging pests away from your expensive tack and equipment.

GENEROUS SIZING FITS MULTIPLE HORSE BLANKETS - our premium storage bag measures 23” long, 19” tall, and 9” in width and can comfortably fit up to three full-sized horse blankets. Our two 8.5” by 11” front mesh pockets allow for even more storage space!

INCLUDES A BUILT-IN NAME TAG SLOT - our blanket storage bag has a 3” by 4” plastic pocket that allows you to add your name or your horse’s information to the bag with ease, helping to prevent confusion and theft, especially in bigger barns.

entry.title: Tahoe Premium Heavy Duty Nylon Waterproof Western Saddle Cover with Six Elastic Holding Straps and Stirrup Covers - Fits Most Saddle Sizes and Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Carry Bags and Covers
Price: 17.99

Tahoe Tack Premium Nylon Western Saddle Cover

This saddle cover keeps your western saddle free from dust and scratches! Waterproof nylon with 1" wide 6 elastic straps to hold skirts and fenders. Great for protecting and transporting your equipment!

Key Features & Item Specifications

  • DURABLE DESIGN - this saddle cover is made from a durable, thick nylon and is designed to keep your saddle free of dust and scratches. It features six 1” wide elastic straps to secure the cover to your saddle’s skirting and fenders
  • PROTECTS YOUR SADDLE - this cover protects your saddle from damage due to dust/debris, scratches, moisture, sun bleaching, etc. Our innovative design covers your entire saddle from horn to the stirrup and the cover is securely held in place
  • WATERPROOF - our saddle covers are waterproof, meaning that your saddle will be protected from rain, leaks in the barn, etc. These covers are great for water protection during transport or at shows as well
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - these western saddle covers are available in five colors: Black, Hunter Green, Pink, Red, and Turquoise
  • FITS MOST SADDLES - this western cover is sized generously and will accommodate almost any size and style of western saddle
